name: Jeray
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: More Birthday to come! and i would like to say that I still liked you very much ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many birthday to come
text2: That's only what i could say
text3: I hope for your better life in the near future.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
